cells.data: -- subsequences :: [a] -> [[a]]-- subsequences :: String -> [String]on subsequences(xs)	script nonEmptySubsequences		on |λ|(xxs)			if length of xxs < 1 then				{}			else				set {x, xs} to {item 1 of xxs, tail(xxs)}						script f					on |λ|(ys, r)						cons(ys, cons(cons(x, ys), r))					end |λ|				end script								cons({x}, foldr(f, {}, |λ|(xs) of nonEmptySubsequences))			end if		end |λ|	end script	if class of xs is text then		cons("", map(my concat, |λ|(characters of xs) of nonEmptySubsequences))	else		cons([], |λ|(xs) of nonEmptySubsequences)	end ifend subsequences
